snippet: The authorities in Belgium raided 48 homes nationwide and arrested suspects in what prosecutors described as a jihadist recruitment drive for the insurgency in Syria.
abstract: Authorities in Belgium raid 48 homes nationwide and arrest six suspects in what prosecutors describe as jihadist recruitment drive for insurgency in Syria spearheaded by group Sharia4Belgium.

byline.original: By JAMES KANTER and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: James Kanter reported from Brussels, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon, and Hala Droubi from Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

lead_paragraph: The authorities in Belgium raided 48 homes nationwide and arrested suspects in what prosecutors described as a jihadist recruitment drive for the insurgency in Syria.
